activities: Lotame does not currently receive personal information (understood in U.S. terms as "Personally Identifiable Information" or "PII") from the EU in connection with online behavioral marketing, but may at a future time.  We currently market and license a data management platform to customers based in several European countries, including the UK.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Direct Marketing Association (DMA); NAI (Network Advertising Initiative); IAB; IAB UK; TrustE
recoursemech: Interested parties who believe that their inquiries to Lotame have not been satisfactorily addressed are invited to contact the DMA Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program.  The DMA will then work with Lotame to resolve concerns.
